name: IMRSV, Inc.
description: Provider of advertising technology for digital signs to deliver tailored messages to customers in real-time. The company's technology is a combination of anonymous facial detection, machine learning based optimization as well as strategies specified by the marketer.
one_liner: Provider of advertising technology for digital signs to deliver tailored messages to customers in real-time. The company's technology is a combination of anonymous facial detection, machine learning based optimization as well as strategies specified by the marketer.
